com.rohanclan.cfml.util
Class CFDocUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.util.CFDocUtils
public class CFDocUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This is a helper class provides methods to manipulate, modify and generally mangle stuff that you find in CF documents.

Author:
Oliver Tupman

Method Detail

eliminateDuplicateParams

public static java.util.Set eliminateDuplicateParams(java.util.Set set1,
                                                     java.util.Set set2)
Removes parameters from set 1 that are named in set 2.

Parameters:
set1 - The set of Parameters to remove the duplicates from
set2 - The set containing the string names of the parameters to remove.
Returns:
A set containing set1 - the intersection of set1 & set2

parseForAttributes

public static java.util.Map parseForAttributes(java.lang.String string2Scan)
Parses a string looking for attributes

Parameters:
string2Scan - Says it all. The string to scan for attributes. Please note that it shouldn't contain any tags.

isValidAttributeValue

public static boolean isValidAttributeValue(java.lang.String attribValue)
Checks a attribute value string to make sure it's valid. Rules for value attribute are: - Has more than two characters - First character and last characters are double quotes - Thats about it :D No further checks just yet.

Parameters:
attribValue - - The attribute to check
Returns:
true/false on whether it's a valid attribute
